Package handler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddUserHandler  
    AddUserToWorkOrderHandler
    The AddUserToWorkOrderHandler class handles the action of adding a user defined in the Handy Andy database to the currently loaded work order.
    EmailWorkOrderHandler
    The EmailWorkOrderHandler object handles the action of creating an Emailer object and running that object on a thread.
    LoginHandler
    The LoginHandler class handles the action of logging into the Handy Andy Application.
    NewRoomHandler
    The NewRoomHandler class handles the addition of a new Room object to the Editor.
    NewRoomItemHandler
    The NewRoomItemHandler class handles the addition of a new RoomItem object to the Editor.
    NewWorkOrderHandler
    The NewWorkOrderHandler class is designed to allow a user to select a Jensen Property Management work order and load it into the Handy Andy Application.
    OpenWorkOrderHandler
    The OpenWorkOrderHandler class handles the opening of a previously saved work order.
    RenameRoomHandler
    The RenameRoomHandler class handles the dialog required to allow a user to rename a room.
    RoomCheckHandler
    The RoomCheckHandler class handles the action of selecting or deselecting a room in the editor.
    RoomItemCheckHandler
    The RoomItemCheckHandler handles the event of selecting or deselecting a RoomItem.
    RoomItemTextHandler
    The RoomItemTextHandler class handles the action of changing the text of a RoomItem.
    SaveHandler
    The SaveHandler class handles the saving of the current state of a loaded work order.
    ScrollInputHandler
    The ScrollInputHandler handles the scrolling of the input document.
    UpdateHandler
